metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11713 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
wolfSSL 4.3.0 has mulmod code in wc_ecc_mulmod_ex in ecc.c that does not properly resist timing side-channel attacks.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11713` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwolfssl35 - 4.4.0+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0+dfsg-2').
